column4: ubuntu noob here, just got it today - how can i check the life of my battery? i cant fine a battery icon anywhere...
hey man.  i just installed ubuntu myself.  try the battery app listed on this blog. -> http://sites.google.com/site/mtrons/howtos/eeepc-1015pn
